Anyone Own A Copy Of SP Chef Aid That Makes Ghost/???
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths and Pranks!: Anyone Own A Copy Of SP Chef Aid That Makes Ghost/???
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, December 19, 2000 - 08:56 am:

I noticed that some other websites' CD lists showed South Park Chef Aid as making a Chef (Ghost/???), my CD didn't but since there's 2 versions of this soundtrack, I went out and bought the other one. I found that the "extreme" version made a Zuum/Bajarl, and the other (which still has a parental advisory on it) makes a Gaboo/Joker.

Anyway, I have edited the existing posts here (both versions I got were already listed in the MRM list, long ago) to reflect the appropriate UPCs.

So now I'm wondering, is there another pressing? -Or is this another CD list prank? If anyone owns this CD and it makes the Ghost/???, could you please post the UPC code here?

By Fade X on Thursday, December 21, 2000 - 01:43 am:

My guess is it is a prank considering that MR2 was probally programed before that CD came out (Although I may be wrong).
